intro: Psychotria charlotteana, commonly known as Charlotte's Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to greenish-white flowers. It is often found in shaded, humid environments such as rainforests. Psychotria charlotteana is also noted for its medicinal properties and is used in traditional herbal remedies.
